robat hamuta shila maniketa daruwek labenna innawa kiyala aaranchi wela, 1990 mayi 21 ra robat hamu amanushika widihata shila manikewa ghathanaya karanawa ee porawal upayogikaragena, me ghathana naduwen robat hamu nidahas wenawa, eka dawasak ra robat hamuta shila manikege dinapotha hambawenawa,ee dinapothe thibbe de kiyawala eda rama robat hamu waha bonawa, eda idan robat hamuge katahada ee walawwa issarahin yana hamotama wage ahenawalu,me walawwe wada karana siriyalathagen ahuwama "mokada oya walawwata wela karanne" kiyala siriyalatha dena uththaraya "man thamayi bebi hamu balaganne" polis parikshana waladi me dinapotha pariksha karala, ee dinapothe shila manike liyala thiyenawa "eda ra walawwe idala panala giye mage ayiya,eya aawe magen salli tikak illaganna,ayiya mawa porondu karagaththa me dewal robatta kiyanna epa kiyala" "mata daruwen labenna innawa kiyala man robatta kiyanna mata awasthawak labunna mokada gedara aapu gaman robat math ekka randu wena hinda... 2012 me walawwa aanduwata pawara gannawa,eda idan e game kawuruth siriyalathawa dakala na...
